entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
